 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָמַת‎</span>] **verb** ==put an end to, exterminate==, in poetry and (in **Qal, Pi\`el**) hyperbolic (properly ***compress***, Late Hebrew ***id., press together***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be silent***, II, IV.***make speechless, silence***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be silent*** (in Lexicons)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽמְתוּ ֗֗֗ חַיָּ֑י‎</span> [[Lam.3.63|Lam 3:63]] = ***they have put an end to my life*** ([[BDB#Bu|Bu]] conjectures ***Pi\`el***). **Niph\`al** ***be ended, annihilated; Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְמַתִּת מִפְּנֵיאחשֶׁךְ‎</span> [[Job.23.17|Job 23:17]] ***I am*** [not] ***annihilated because of*** (the) ***darkness***; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְמָ֑תוּ‎</span> [[Job.6.17|Job 6:17]] (of dried-up brooks). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִמְּתַתְנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.139|Ps 119:139]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִנְאָתִי‎</span> ***hath put an end to me*** (it is so intense). **Pi\`lel** ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִמְּתֻתוּנִי‎</span> (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִמְּתוּנִי‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:55d»§ 55d</sup>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִמְּתָ֑תְנִי‎</span>) [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:145k»§ 145k</sup>]; compare [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]) [[Ps.88.17|Ps 88:17]] thine alarms ***have annihilated me.*** **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצְמַתָּה‎</span> [[Ps.73.27|Ps 73:27]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצְמִיתֵם‎</span> [[Ps.94.23|Ps 94:23]] (twice in verse); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּצְמִית‎</span> [[Ps.143.12|Ps 143:12]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצְמִיתֵם‎</span> [[Ps.54.7|Ps 54:7]] ***Participle*** plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצְמִיתַי‎</span> [[Ps.69.5|Ps 69:5]] — ***exterminate, annihilate***, with accusative of person, subject Psalmist [[Ps.18.41|Ps 18:41]] = [[2Sam.22.41|2Sam 22:41]] (read as in Psalms), [[Ps.101.5|Ps 101:5]]; [[Ps.101.8|Ps 101:8]] his foes [[Ps.69.5|Ps 69:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.54.7|Ps 54:7]]; [[Ps.73.27|Ps 73:27]]; [[Ps.94.23|Ps 94:23]] (twice in verse); [[Ps.143.12|Ps 143:12]].
